name: Avatars.io
description: Every app needs avatars, we make it hassle-free. Hosted user avatar service for your apps and sites. Avatars.io supports 3 sizes for avatars. We are mapping to the actual service, so theres no “guaranteed” size. Avatars.io lets your users upload their own avatars, in case you dont want to use one from a specific service.
